definition: to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Or, would you consider yourself a failure?
sentences.chinese: 你會認爲自己是一個失敗者嗎？

sentences.english: Jenny is destined to be a loser.
Few people are total winners or losers.
sentences.chinese: 很少有人是完全的成功者或失敗者。

sentences.english: Don't chant things like "loser" or taunt them when they lose.
sentences.chinese: 不要反覆喊着“失敗者”或者奚落他們。

sentences.english: The lessons of these losers deserve our reflection.
sentences.chinese: 這些失敗者的教訓值得所有媒體反思。

sentences.english: The losers and maimed quell their sniffling for the sake of unity.
sentences.chinese: 失敗者們會爲了黨內的團結而停止他們的抱怨。

sentences.english: The gold market needs to make its admirers feel like losers.
sentences.chinese: 金市需要使其崇拜者時常有失敗者的感覺。

sentences.english: Wow, a LOSER is in the house.
sentences.chinese: 喔，一個失敗者登堂入室了。

sentences.english: Failures do what is tension relieving, while winners do what is goal achieving.
sentences.chinese: 失敗者做的是緩和緊張而成功者做的是實現目標。

sentences.english: People will see me as a failure.
sentences.chinese: 別人會把我看作一個失敗者。

sentences.english: But the marketplace seems quite efficient at weeding out the losers.
sentences.chinese: 但市場淘汰失敗者的效率好像特別高。

sentences.english: The loser's scorn for the award is pure sour grape.
sentences.chinese: 失敗者對獎品的輕視純粹是喫不到葡萄說葡萄酸。

sentences.english: There is a second place bowl game, but it is a game for losers played by losers.
sentences.chinese: 那是一場木球比賽，但是那是屬於失敗者的遊戲。

sentences.english: A failure is a man who has blundered, but is not able to cash in on the experience. -(Elbert Hubbard)
sentences.chinese: 失敗者是犯了錯誤而不能從中吸取教訓的人。

sentences.english: Let's try to buck the losers up.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們努力使失敗者精神振奮。

sentences.english: I just hope they do three things for losers like me.
sentences.chinese: 我只希望他們能對像我一樣的失敗者做三件事情。

definition: to keep on saying (idiom); to repeat over and over again
to rebel against orthodoxy/to depart from established practices
not to engage in honest work/to ignore one's proper occupation/not to attend to one's proper duties
to leave (the stage, an exam room, the playing field etc)/to take part in some activity/to take an examination (in the imperial examination system)
social movement/abbr. for 社會運動|社会运动
sacrificial victim/sb who is expendable/item sold at a loss
